mapper.select: select center_fk,pt_fk,pt_nm,unit,origin_nm,storage_nm,tax_nm,sale_cost,exp_D,exp_T from productcon_tb left join (select origin_nm,unit,pt_cd,pt_nm,storage_nm,tax_nm,cate_nm from product_tb left join storage_tb on storage_fk=storage_cd left join tax_tb on tax_fk=tax_cd left join category_tb on cate_cd=category_fk left join origin_tb on origin_cd=origin_fk) on pt_fk=pt_cd
select /*+INDEX_DESC(customer_tb pk_customer_tb)*/rownum rn, customer_cd, pre_nm, customer_rcd, customer_nm, c.address, center_fk, emp_nm from customer_tb c left join emp_tb e on c.emp_fk = e.emp_cd
